name: 2022 the 6th International Conference on System Reliability and Safety
content: Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into ICSRS 2022 Conference Proceedings. The Conference content will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore as well as other Abstracting and Indexing (A&I) databases. The proceedings is expected to be indexed by Scopus & EI Compendex, etc. ICSRS 2022 is listed in IEEE Official Conference Calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/56243
